name: BakaBT Dark Theme
description: Dark Theme for BakaBT. BakaSHOTS Dark Theme: https://userstyles.org/styles/164901/ More screenshots: https://imgur.com/a/35I6ok3 This theme applies to the main site. Not affected by this style: forums, wiki and every page that is not in the www.bakabt.me domain. Suggestions are welcome. You can change the colors to suit your needs and/or try new color combinations by using the declared variables in the html selector at the beginning of the code. Disclaimer: This is a user created style not officially endorsed by BakaBT.
